programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Child
programme.desc: In the hopes of giving her baby a better life, Akça, a hooker, is forced to give up her child, who is taken to be brought up by the wealthy Sule, but the situation changes after the latter has a baby of her own.

programme.title: My Siblings
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: Secrets of an Angel
programme.desc: After years of abuse at the hands of her husband, Cennet phones Zeynep, a lawyer. After his death, he leaves a letter, which turns out to be a criminal complaint, upon which the lives of Cennet's children and Yilmaz will never be the same after that day.

programme.title: Hayet Khassa
programme.desc: The series sheds light on the daily life of Tunisian youth, through the depiction of the everyday lives of college students and the problems they encounter as they graduate and start working, with a focus on the struggles working women face to balance their jobs with their obligations at home.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball S1
programme.desc: Set in the city of Elmore, where the 12-year-old cat Gumball engages in many adventures with the help of his dear friend Darwin, his pet goldfish that has grown legs and became a member of the Watterson family.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show S5
programme.desc: In season 5, the events of the series continue to follow the adventures of the cat Tom in his never-ending quest to catch his eternal arch-enemy, the mouse Jerry.

programme.title: Ekans - Snakes Awake
programme.desc: The events revolve around a smart thirteen-year-old boy named Ekans, who acquires a supernatural power that gives him the ability to control snakes. Using modern technology, he is able to confront villains and keep his city safe.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! S1
programme.desc: The adventures of the superheroes’ friends, Starfire, Robin, Raven, Beast Boy, and Cyborg, as they try to fight crime and save the day.

programme.title: Regular Show S1
programme.desc: As the two friends Mordecai the blue jay and Rigby the raccoon work as groundskeepers at a local park, they land themselves in various trouble while trying to have fun in any way possible.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: The story follows a boy named Finn and his friend Jake the dog who has magical powers, as they both live in the Land of Ooo where they embark on wild adventures with other characters including the Ice King and Princess Bubblegum.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S1
programme.desc: The adventures of the three bear brothers, Grizzly, Panda, and Ice Bear, as they try to fit in among the human world and make friends with the humans while searching for food and shelter.

programme.title: Roll No. 21
programme.desc: As the wicked Kansa disguises himself as the benevolent principal of a school for orphans Kanishk while plotting to seize control over Earth, the gods decide to send Krishna to pass himself off as Kris, a student of the school, in order to foil his evil plans.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: Armed with their superpowers and extra cuteness, Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup continue to save the day from all the evil plans the bad guys are intending for Townsville.

programme.title: Kontak
programme.desc: Current social and political issues based on true events are presented in a comedy setting in this series.

programme.title: Thuluj alsayf
programme.desc: Among people’s every day stories, Ahmed and Nabila share love but their careers matter a lot in supporting their families. In Laila’s story, she is an undergraduate whose family depends on her father’s small income, and she seldom sees her married siblings. A third story is about Bothayna and Salah who are happily married with a son, but are parted when Salah gets shot while chasing smugglers.

programme.title: Harem Al-Shawish
programme.desc: The series revolves around the love of money and power and how the simple and complicated social issues are resolved. It also discusses the things that disturb the lives of people who bring out evil and good in other people's lives.

programme.title: Baad Edet Sanawat
programme.desc: It discusses the change between the past and the present, as the events are set between the 1980s and the year 2014 through Abu Nawras, who lives in a working-class neighborhood and has many children.

programme.title: Forsa Akhera
programme.desc: The story of a woman whose husband has died. She and her son move to live with his family. Afterwards, her relationship with another man causes many conflicts in the family.

programme.title: Zelzal
programme.desc: Harbi buys a house in installments from Khalil who refuses to register the house in Harbi's name after he completes the payment. When the earthquake of 1992 happens, Harbi dies. programme.title: Al-Heiba Al-Awda
programme.desc: When Jabal's father is murdered, the blood feud sends his family and the Al-Sa'eid family into a cycle of violence and tribal conflicts, as those who have unfinished business with Jabal's father appear to complicate things for Jabal.

programme.title: Udaariyaan
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab; however, as the daughter Jasmine dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Hayya Al Rouh
programme.desc: The story follows an angelic girl named Haya, who, despite her disability, defies all circumstances and insists on confronting them, especially her uncle Mubarak, who left her in the care of her stepfather, Abdul Rahman.

programme.title: End Share 9
programme.desc: After he became wealthy following an unexpected event that took place years ago, Fares finds himself targeted by Adnan and a person close to him.

programme.desc: An anthology series of various tales from everyday life, including the story, "The White Eyeglasses", that follows Fakhr, who invents a pair of glasses that, when worn, can tell you how others truly feel about you underneath the lies and niceties.

programme.desc: Mae cân Glas y Dorlan yn mynd ar nerfau pawb ar wahan i Chîff sy'n ei defnyddio i gael Dwl a Giamocas i ufuddhau iddo. Glas y Dorlan is singing an irritating song to all but Chîff.

programme.title: Amser Maith Maith yn ôl
programme.desc: Rhaglen lle gallwn ddysgu mwy am gyfnodau arall ar hyd y canrifoedd. A programme in which we learn more about different periods in history.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Gwyrdd yn cyrraedd, gan ddod â'i lliw naturiol i Wlad y Lliwiau. Green arrives, bringing her natural colour to Colourland.

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae lleidr wedi cyrraedd y fferm, ond yr unig beth mae'n ei ddwyn yw letys! There's a thief on the farm, but the only thing stolen is a lettuce! Can the friends catch the culprit?

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae slejio gwyllt Mario'n helpu dadorchuddio pannas Magi tra bod Siôn a Jac Jôs yn delio gyda phibau wedi eu rhewi. Mario's errant sledging provides the solution to Magi's frozen parsnips!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Bydd taith heddiw'n mynd â ni i Fongolia sydd yn Asia - gwlad sy'n bell iawn o'r arfordir sy'n gartref i'r anialwch Gobi. We go to Mongolia where native people called Nomads live in tents.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae'r Octonots yn dilyn mamau pengwin ymerodrol sydd ar eu ffordd adref at eu teuluoedd. The Octonauts follow emperor penguin mums returning to their families.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cân draddodiadol am antur Deryn y Bwn o Fannau Brycheiniog wrth iddo fynd ar ei wyliau. This Welsh song follows the adventures of a Bitten Bird from the Brecon Beacons as he goes on holiday.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Palu Soch yn helpu Dino ddod o hyd i gartref i'r holl 'stwff' sy'n creu llanast yn ei ogof. Diggy Piggy helps Deeno to find a home for all the 'stuff' he has filling up his den.

programme.title: Kim a Cêt a Twrch
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cêt ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim and Cêt on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Blero'n Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd yn myd Blero heddiw tybed? What's happening in the world of Blero today?

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Dewi Sant sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Dewi Sant join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Wil ac Aeron: Taith Rwmania
programme.desc: Mae Wil ac Aeron yn cyd-fyw â theulu biliwnydd sy'n rhedeg fferm fodern ac yn cyflogi staff o bob rhan o Ewrop. Wil and Aeron join a billionaire family who run a modern farm in Romania. [SL]

programme.title: Wil ac Aeron Fferm Fodern - Season 1, Episode 3
Heno
programme.desc: Dathlwn Dydd Gwyl Dewi yn y stiwdio, a Caryl a Gerallt sydd wedi bod mewn parêd arbennig. We celebrate St David's Day and are in Ammanford to mark the 40th anniversary of the Miners' Strike.

programme.title: Cymry ar Gynfas
programme.desc: Yr artist tirluniau Lisa Eurgain Taylor sy'n cwrdd â'r cyflwynydd Trystan Ellis-Morris cyn creu portread ohono. This time, artist Lisa Eurgain Taylor paints Trystan Ellis-Morris.

programme.title: Cymry ar Gynfas Trystan Ellis-Morris - Season 4, Episode 5
Dan Do
programme.desc: Ymweliad â beudy wedi ei drawsnewid yn gartre trawiadol yng Ngogledd Ceredigion, a thy newydd sy'n gartre teuluol perffaith yn y Gwyr. We visit a stylish terraced house in Pontcanna.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: New: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Stryd i'r Sgrym
programme.desc: Bydd Rhian, hyfforddwr y tîm, yn cwrdd â'i harwr hyfforddi, Warren Gatland, wrth iddo baratoi tîm Cymru ar gyfer y Chwe Gwlad. The team meet their rugby hero - ex-captain Ken Owens.

programme.title: New: Bwyd Chris Byr
programme.desc: Risét o drydedd cyfres Bwyd Epic Chris - Sando Stêc Chris. A recipe from the third series of Bwyd Epic Chris - Japanese Sando Sandwich.

programme.title: Bwyd Epic Chris Sando Stec Chris - Season 1, Episode 1
Odo
programme.desc: Caiff Odo a'i ffrindie gyfle i greu ffilm am Maes y Mes. Dyw e ddim beth chi'n ei ddisgwyl! Ond mae'n dangos y lle fel man hapus. Odo and friends make their very own movie about Forest Camp.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'n ddiwrnod rasio yn Pentre Papur Pop ac mae Pip wedi dewis y cwrs! On today's poptastic adventure, it's the annual Pop Paper City go-kart race.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Guto ishe gwybod o ble mae mefus yn dod. Felly mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn mynd ag ef i Fferm Fach er mwyn dangos hud ffermio iddo. Guto wants to know where strawberries come from.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, ond pan mae'n treulio'r noson yn nhy nain, mae'r lle yn rhy dawel. Pablo can't sleep when he spends the night at Nain's house. It is too quiet.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw ry' ni am ymweld â gwlad sy'n gartref i goedwig law yr Amason a mynyddoedd yr Andes - Colombia! We visit the capital city of Colombia, Bogotá, and learn about produce like coffee.

programme.title: Larfa
programme.desc: Beth yw'r broblem y tro hwn? Cariad un-ochrog! What's the problem this time? Unrequited love!

programme.title: Byd Rwtsh Dai Potsh
programme.desc: Mae'r Potshiwrs wedi mynd bant yn eu campyr ond erbyn diwedd y gwyliau mae nhw wedi cyrraedd gwaelod y môr. Help! The Spuds take the camper on holiday, and end up at the bottom of the sea!

programme.title: LEGO ® Ffrindiau: Amdani Ferched!
programme.desc: Mae Andrea'n darganfod bod Hazel yn arbenigwr ar drwsio ceir, a beth sydd angen arnyn nhw? The girls reunite feuding best friends and up their chances of winning the Grand Prix.

programme.title: Itopia
programme.desc: Drama sci-fi yn llawn dirgelwch. Sci-fi drama full of mystery.

programme.title: New: Newyddion Ni
programme.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programme for youngsters.

programme.title: Arfordir Cymru: Sir Benfro
programme.desc: Bydd Bedwyr yn teithio o Drefdraeth i Abergwaun gan gyfarfod cerflunydd sy'n cael ei ysbrydoli gan enwau'r arfordir. Bedwyr learns about the Pembrokeshire dialect as he travels to Fishguard.

programme.title: Arfordir Cymru Trefdraeth i Abergwaun - Season 1, Episode 6

programme.desc: Mae ymwelydd annisgwyl i'r Ty Pizza yn gadael blas drwg yng ngheg Jason, a dal i rygnu 'mlaen mae'r sefyllfa annifyr yn yr Iard. An unexpected visitor to the Ty Pizza leaves Jason in shock.

programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.
